abstract: Mitt Romney's presidential campaign has lassoed a few big Wall Street supporters, The New York Times reports.
snippet: Mitt Romney's presidential campaign has lassoed a few big Wall Street supporters, The New York Times reports.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney's presidential campaign has lassoed a few big Wall Street supporters, The New York Times reports. Among them are James B. Lee, Jr., the marquee J.P. Morgan banker, and several prominent hedge fund managers, including Paul Singer, Clifford S. Asness and Daniel S. Loeb. Read more »
